chunk:
Alchemy Holistics Ultra Gentle Face Cleanser

Brand: Alchemy

Category: Facial Cleanser

Brand: Alchemy

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: aloe barbadensis leaf juice*, vegetable glycerin, limnanthes alba (meadowfoam seed) oil*, saponified cocos nucifera (coconut) oil*^, tocopherol (vitamin E), xanthan gum*, lactobacillus ferment (radish root extract), melaleuca (tea tree), lavandula (lavender)
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
